example.sen: Or at the very least, the loss of any no-claims bonus.
example.sen_tran: 但明年的无索偿奖金肯定泡汤了

example.sen: No, you're a no-count, plundering, lazy bump on a log.
example.sen_tran: 错 你是个没钱没品又懒惰的呆子

tran.adj: 夜的；夜曲的；夜间发生的

example.sen: to some kind of nocturnal civil defense air raid siren,that goes off every fucking night like it's pearl harbor.
example.sen_tran: 而是夜夜都像珍珠港一样鸣笛的,夜间民防空袭警报

example.origin: 来自《侠胆雄狮 第1季》
example.sen: I mean, you're like Mr. Nocturnal Guy, right?
example.sen_tran: 你就像夜行人一样 对吧

example.sen: A great many people experience fits of nocturnal anxiety.
example.sen_tran: 很多人在夜晚都会焦虑

example.sen: Your nocturnal activities don't count as service to the Reich.
example.sen_tran: 你的夜间活动不能算作是为德国效力

example.origin: 来自《新闻编辑室 第3季 第1集》
example.sen: Neal, tell us what's going on with the nocturnal nut brigade.
example.sen_tran: 尼尔 夜行傻子队情况如何[指网络平民侦探队]
